channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-22277|2024-09-17T01:41:41.993Z -- abb -- 800xa%2C%20control%20software%20for%20ac%20800m
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA, Control Software for AC 800M, Control Builder Safe, Compact Product Suite - Control and I/O, ABB Base Software for SoftControl allows an attacker to cause the denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-24677|2024-09-17T04:00:06.225Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: Vulnerabilities in the S+ Operations and S+ Historian web applications can lead to a possible code execution and privilege escalation, redirect the user somewhere else or download unwanted data.

item.title: CVE-2018-17928|2024-09-17T02:36:09.547Z -- abb -- cms-770
item.description: The product CMS-770 (Software Versions 1.7.1 and prior)is vulnerable that an attacker can read sensitive configuration files by bypassing the user authentication mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2022-34838|2024-09-17T02:53:31.652Z -- abb -- abb%20zenon
item.description: Storing Passwords in a Recoverable Format vulnerability in ABB Zenon 8.20 allows an attacker who successfully exploit the vulnerability may add or alter data points and corresponding attributes. Once such engineering data is used the data visualization will be altered for the end user.

item.title: CVE-2021-22286|2024-09-17T01:00:59.359Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2022-28702|2024-09-17T00:30:55.177Z -- abb -- e-design
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in ABB e-Design allows attacker to install malicious software executing with SYSTEM permissions violating confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the target machine.

item.title: CVE-2022-34836|2024-09-17T02:26:50.116Z -- abb -- abb%20zenon
item.description: Relative Path Traversal vulnerability in ABB Zenon 8.20 allows the user to access files on the Zenon system and user also can add own log messages and e.g., flood the log entries. An attacker who successfully exploit the vulnerability could access the Zenon runtime activities such as the start and stop of various activity and the last error code etc.

item.title: CVE-2020-24683|2024-09-17T01:36:41.524Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: The affected versions of S+ Operations (version 2.1 SP1 and earlier) used an approach for user authentication which relies on validation at the client node (client-side authentication). This is not as secure as having the server validate a client application before allowing a connection. Therefore, if the network communication or endpoints for these applications are not protected, unauthorized actors can bypass authentication and make unauthorized connections to the server application.

item.title: CVE-2020-24679|2024-09-17T01:20:53.487Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: A S+ Operations and S+ Historian service is subject to a DoS by special crafted messages. An attacker might use this flaw to make it crash or even execute arbitrary code on the machine where the service is hosted.

item.title: CVE-2020-24672|2024-09-17T00:50:49.998Z -- abb -- base%20software%20for%20softcontrol
item.description: A vulnerability in Base Software for SoftControl allows an attacker to insert and run arbitrary code in a computer running the affected product. This issue affects: .

item.title: CVE-2020-24680|2024-09-17T01:51:49.326Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In S+ Operations and S+ Historian, the passwords of internal users (not Windows Users) are encrypted but improperly stored in a database.

item.title: CVE-2022-0902|2024-09-17T02:00:38.883Z -- abb -- rmc-100%20%28standard%29
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal'), Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in flow computer and remote controller products of ABB ( RMC-100 (Standard), RMC-100-LITE, XIO, XFCG5 , XRCG5 , uFLOG5 , UDC) allows an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could insert and run arbitrary code in an affected system node.

item.title: CVE-2022-34837|2024-09-17T04:04:24.349Z -- abb -- abb%20zenon
item.description: Storing Passwords in a Recoverable Format vulnerability in ABB Zenon 8.20 allows an attacker who successfully exploit the vulnerability may add more network clients that may monitor various activities of the Zenon.

item.title: CVE-2020-24678|2024-09-17T02:51:56.476Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: An authenticated user might execute malicious code under the user context and take control of the system. S+ Operations or S+ Historian database is affected by multiple vulnerabilities such as the possibility to allow remote authenticated users to gain high privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-0947|2024-09-17T01:01:17.567Z -- abb -- abb%20arg600%20wireless%20gateway%20series
item.description: A vulnerability in ABB ARG600 Wireless Gateway series that could allow an attacker to exploit the vulnerability by remotely connecting to the serial port gateway, and/or protocol converter, depending on the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-10616|2024-09-17T00:45:46.975Z -- abb -- abb%20panel%20builder%20800
item.description: ABB Panel Builder 800 all versions has an improper input validation vulnerability which may allow an attacker to insert and run arbitrary code on a computer where the affected product is used.

item.title: CVE-2019-5620|2024-09-17T03:28:34.323Z -- abb -- microscada%20pro%20sys600
item.description: ABB MicroSCADA Pro SYS600 version 9.3 suffers from an instance of CWE-306: Missing Authentication for Critical Function.

item.title: CVE-2021-22288|2024-09-17T04:04:28.914Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2020-11639|2024-08-04T11:35:13.593Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by injecting garbage data or specially crafted data. Depending on the data injected each process might be affected differently. The process could crash or cause communication issues on the affected node, effectively causing a denial-of-service attack. The attacker could tamper with the data transmitted, causing the product to store wrong information or act on wrong data or display wrong information.
This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
For an attack to be successful, the attacker must have local access to a node in the system and be able to start a specially crafted application that disrupts the communication. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability would be able to manipulate the data in such way as allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause Windows processes in 800xA for MOD 300 and AdvaBuild to crash.

item.title: CVE-2020-11640|2024-08-04T11:35:13.681Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
AdvaBuild uses a command queue to launch certain operations. An attacker who gains access to the command queue can use it to launch an attack by running any executable on the AdvaBuild node. The executables that can be run are not limited to AdvaBuild specific executables.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in ABB Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild.This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2024-6209|2024-08-01T21:33:05.139Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description:
Unauthorized file access in WEB Server in ABB ASPECT - Enterprise v <=3.08.01; NEXUS Series
v <=3.08.01
; MATRIX Series
v<=3.08.01 allows Attacker to access files unauthorized

item.title: CVE-2024-5402|2024-08-01T21:11:12.639Z -- abb -- mint%20workbench%20i
item.description:
Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in ABB Mint Workbench.
A local attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain elevated privileges by inserting an executable file in the path of the affected service.
This issue affects Mint Workbench I versions: from 5866 before 5868.

item.title: CVE-2024-6298|2024-08-01T21:33:05.210Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB ASPECT-Enterprise on Linux, ABB NEXUS Series on Linux, ABB MATRIX Series on Linux allows Remote Code Inclusion.This issue affects ASPECT-Enterprise: through 3.08.01; NEXUS Series: through 3.08.01; MATRIX Series: through 3.08.01.

item.title: CVE-2024-3036|2024-08-01T19:32:42.587Z -- abb -- 800xa%20base
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA Base. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause services to crash by sending specifically crafted messages. This issue affects 800xA Base: from 6.0.0 through 6.1.1-2.

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-07-29T14:31:30.849Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2020-11639|2024-07-23T19:10:57.887Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by injecting garbage data or specially crafted data. Depending on the data injected each process might be affected differently. The process could crash or cause communication issues on the affected node, effectively causing a denial-of-service attack. The attacker could tamper with the data transmitted, causing the product to store wrong information or act on wrong data or display wrong information.
This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
For an attack to be successful, the attacker must have local access to a node in the system and be able to start a specially crafted application that disrupts the communication. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability would be able to manipulate the data in such way as allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause Windows processes in 800xA for MOD 300 and AdvaBuild to crash.

This issue affects Mint Workbench I versions: from 5866 before 5868.

item.title: CVE-2024-4007|2024-07-03T14:13:05.048Z -- abb -- aspect%20enterprise%20%28asp-ent-x%29
item.description: Default credential in install package in ABB ASPECT; NEXUS Series; MATRIX Series version 3.07 allows attacker to login to product instances wrongly configured.

item.title: CVE-2024-3036|2024-06-22T16:40:36.032Z -- abb -- 800xa%20base
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA Base. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause services to crash by sending specifically crafted messages. This issue affects 800xA Base: from 6.0.0 through 6.1.1-2.

item.title: CVE-2024-1913|2024-06-04T18:00:16.786Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:
An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could cause the robot to stop, make the robot controller inaccessible, or execute arbitrary code.
The vulnerability could potentially be exploited to perform unauthorized actions by an attacker. This vulnerability arises under specific condition when specially crafted message is processed by the system.
Below are reported vulnerabilities in the Robot Ware versions.
* IRC5- RobotWare 6 < 6.15.06 except 6.10.10, and 6.13.07 * OmniCore- RobotWare 7 < 7.14

item.title: CVE-2024-1914|2024-06-06T13:17:40.400Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:

item.title: CVE-2020-11640|2024-07-23T17:36:51.458Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
AdvaBuild uses a command queue to launch certain operations. An attacker who gains access to the command queue can use it to launch an attack by running any executable on the AdvaBuild node. The executables that can be run are not limited to AdvaBuild specific executables.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in ABB Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild.This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
